name: FNF - Door To Door Door Salesman
name_original: FNF - Door To Door Door Salesman
description:
VS Door to Door Door Salesman

Woken by his doorbell, Boyfriend goes to his doorway and notices a lack of said door. On his porch stands a somewhat sleazy looking businessman, with a pile of... Doors behind him? What could he have to say?

What's included:
  • A fancy new intro
  • Three songs and an intro track
  • A sleazy salesman who might steal your doors
  • Some neat dialogue

NOTE:
This mod uses a custom EXE, meaning that you will have to redo your Kade Engine settings. Also, the HXCCP Debugger is included with the EXE, so don't panic when you see a console window pop up when you launch the mod!
